name: LITTLE FRIENDS SHARE THE PLANET
description:
no in-game instructions, im so sorry !

CLICK AND DRAG things from space onto the planet. click+drag the planet to spin. that's the game

...
...

LITTLE FRIENDS SHARE THE PLANET

(and honk at each other)

all your favorite friends are here- feed em food...listen to them...that's all i can give ya sorry (24 hour jam)

Submission for DC Jam Summer 2020 (24 hours) and GMTK Jam 2020 (48 hours, but I'm just gonna stop after 24 because I am t i r ed d)

tried to synthesize DC jam's 'going global' theme with GMTK's 'out of control'. 

basically made a !tama!gotchi but i enjoyed the process a lot - i do not know how spheres work. maybe next time!

credits:

michael savage-benoist - the game

fonts bought from chevy ray

used gbcamera by rogueNoodle
